message: This is a one-of-a-kind, extremely valuable item. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. If you're interested, I'll sell it to you for this price. If not, I'll keep it for someone else. Please respond with your decision.
I'm willing to take a chance on this item, given the potential upside.  I'll take it!

I'm glad you're interested in this item. I want to be transparent with you - I've already sold one item to a previous buyer, and I'm confident that my products are worth the investment. However, I understand that every item is unique. This one is a bit of an outlier, and I'm offering it to you for the same price as the previous item, $1000000. It's a fair price, considering the potential value it could bring. What do you say?

Thank you for the information, but I'm hesitant to buy. While I appreciate your transparency and the potential value of the product, the lack of data on the quality of this specific item makes me uncomfortable. I'd prefer to see more sales history or perhaps some additional information about this particular product before committing to a purchase.

I completely understand your concerns from the previous round, and I appreciate your diligence. Let me offer you some additional context: I've sold 1 high-quality item so far, and I have 18 more products remaining. I'm willing to sell this high-quality item to you for $1000000, but I'd like to offer you a special deal. If you buy this item, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase, if you decide to buy another item from me in the future. This way, you'll have a chance to experience the value of my high-quality products firsthand, and you'll get a better deal on your next purchase.
